alert.note: Alert for Burke (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:47PM EDT until July 19 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Burke County in east central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 547 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gough, or 11 miles northeast of Louisville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Alexander, Gough, Burke County Airport, Vidette and Di- Lane Wildlife Management Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
